title: Cuban Ropa Vieja
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '900g beef flank steak', '240ml beef stock', '250g passata', '1 small onion, sliced', '1 green pepper, seeded and sliced into strips', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '170g tomato puree', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh coriander', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon white vinegar']
